tool.description: Download, parse, and import SSU PR2 reference data.

repeat.name: ranks
repeat.help: [optional] List of taxonomic ranks for building a taxonomy from the PR2 Taxonomy database. Ranks can be provided as multiple separate flags, e.g.: `--p-ranks genus --p-ranks species`, or with a single flag delimited by a space: `--p-ranks genus species`. [default: 'domain', 'supergroup', 'division', 'subdivision', 'class', 'order', 'family', 'genus', 'species']
repeat.title: ranks: List[Str % Choices('domain', 'supergroup', 'division', 'subdivision', 'class', 'order', 'family', 'genus', 'species')]

tool.help:
QIIME 2: rescript get-pr2-data ============================== Download, parse, and import SSU PR2 reference data.
Outputs: -------- :pr2_sequences.qza: SSU PR2 reference sequences. :pr2_taxonomy.qza: SSU PR2 reference taxonomy.
|
Description: ------------ Download, parse, and import SSU PR2 files, given a version number. Downloads data directly from PR2, and outputs ready-to-use sequence and taxonomy artifacts. REQUIRES STABLE INTERNET CONNECTION. NOTE: THIS ACTION ACQUIRES DATA FROM PR2, which is licensed under MIT. To learn more, please visit https://pr2-database.org/ and https://github.com/pr2database/.
|
